name: GLAOX
description:
Game is still in development but here are some features:

Game is quite difficult to play. There are different colored platform tiles with their own unique characteristics, sometimes they are placed as traps so be aware of them and try to use them as an advantage.
A game is not good if there are no enemies and obstacles.
Enemies are also different colored. if the player is in their front and behind they start to chase the player.

to clear the game, first, find the UFO to open the portal, then head towards the portal to clear the level.
